sentences.english: The pericratonic uplifts tend to act as the tectonic barriers.
sentences.chinese: 而克拉通边缘隆起则具有构造障壁的作用。

sentences.english: In Taiyuan formation, the southern sandstone body deposited from barrier islands, the northern sandstone body deposited from delta.
sentences.chinese: 太原组砂体南部为障壁岛沉积，北部为三角洲沉积。

sentences.english: The presence of sea ice and of permafrost helps protect Arctic barrier islands for much of the year.
sentences.chinese: 海冰和冻土层的出现很多年来帮助保护了北极障壁岛。

sentences.english: Tidal sedimentary is the main deposition in the barrier coast system.
sentences.chinese: 障壁海岸体系主要为潮坪沉积。

sentences.english: The barrier coast in Wanning Xiaohai of Hainan Island is investigated in both field and laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 对万宁小海障壁海岸进行了野外考察和室内研究。

sentences.english: Results Fan delta and barrier coast sedimentary are widely developed in the Taiyuan formation.
sentences.chinese: 结果太原组发育扇三角洲和障壁海岸沉积。

definition: cage used to hold or transport prisoners
water screen (screen formed of sprayed water droplets, used for displaying projected images, for temperature control, or for air purification)
in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
